author: icambron
title: Bar√ßa is perfect and so is this set
review:
This is the ultimate Barça fan showpiece set, but it's important to approach it as a fan, rather than as someone hoping to play with the set. Although I absolutely adore this set because the architecture is incredible and the aesthetics are perfect, it is not a particularly fun build. It is monotonous and only the fact that I could slowly seemy favourite stadium in the world taking shape kept me going. Now that it is finished, however, I adore it. It's a display piece and a display piece only as there simply is no way to really play with it. I plan on incorporating it into a large cityscape, but it will function as a distant stadium rather than something minifigures can really visit.

If you're not a Barça fan, you will not enjoy this set, but if you are, it is incredible, especially with the addition of the canalets set.
